name: Velaiyilla Pattathari
summary_text: A jobless young man gets to redeem himself.

name: Race with the Devil
summary_text: Two couples vacationing together in an R.V. from Texas to Colorado are terrorized after they witness a murder during a Satanic ritual.

name: Timber Falls
summary_text: A weekend of camping in the mountains becomes an excursion into hell for a young couple, who become pawns in a grotesque plot hatched by deranged locals.

name: Restraint
summary_text: A young couple on the run hole up in a country estate with a hostage in tow.

name: The Crimson Pirate
summary_text: During the 1700s, pirate Captain Vallo seizes a British warship and gets involved in various money-making schemes involving Caribbean rebels led by El Libre, British envoy Baron Jose Gruda, and a beautiful courtesan named Consuelo.

name: Hunter Prey
summary_text: A spaceship crashes on a desert planet with 3 survivors besides the escaped prisoner. Extraction's in 110 hours.

name: Torso
summary_text: A string of appalling lust murders shocks the University of Perugia as a sadistic serial killer strangles to death beautiful college girls with a red and black scarf.

name: The Other End of the Line
summary_text: An employee at an Indian call-center travels to San Francisco to be with a guy she falls for over the phone.

name: Dondurmam Gaymak
summary_text: Ali, who is ice cream salesman in Mugla, tries to survive in the face of fierce competition from the big ice cream brands. While trying to promote his ice cream, he tours the village with ...                See full summary »

name: The Tripper
summary_text: A Ronald Reagan-obsessed serial killer targets a bunch of hippies who are heading to a weekend-long concert.

name: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty
summary_text: A clumsy daydreamer gets caught up in a sinister conspiracy.

name: Grand Masti
summary_text: Meet, Prem, and Amar look to have a blast at their college reunion, though they soon find themselves in another predicament.

name: The Border Post
summary_text: A small border post on the Yugoslav-Albanian border in the spring of 1987. Frustrated and always drunk, lieutenant Pasic feels a strange pain in his groins. He seeks help from the only ...                See full summary »

name: Bumchoiwaui junjaeng: Nabbeunnomdeul jeonsungshidae
summary_text: On the verge of being fired, a corrupt customs official finds a haul of drugs and teams up with a vicious gangster to become the most powerful crime partnership in Busan.

name: Osman Pazarlama
summary_text: A man is trying to work out on his job in a funny and dramatic way.

name: Penguin Bloom
summary_text: A family takes in an injured Magpie that makes a profound difference in their lives.

name: I Am a Hero
summary_text: A manga artist assistant is surprised by a zombie apocalypse.

name: The Third Murder
summary_text: A courtroom drama centered around the murder of a factory president.

name: Forget Me Not
summary_text: Recent high school graduates become prey of the vengeful spirit of an innocent girl they wronged long ago.

name: The Glass Key
summary_text: A crooked politician finds himself being accused of murder by a gangster from whom he refused help during a re-election campaign.

name: Marjorie Prime
summary_text: A service that provides holographic recreations of deceased loved ones allows a woman to come face-to-face with the younger version of her late husband.

name: Maybe... Maybe Not
summary_text: Thrown out by his girlfriend from her apartment, Axel lives for a while with Norbert, a gay man he met some days before.

name: Avalon
summary_text: A Polish-Jewish family comes to the U.S. at the beginning of the twentieth century. There, the family and their children try to make themselves a better future in the so-called promised land.

name: Miss Stevens
summary_text: A heart-broken teacher chaperones a group of high schoolers to a state drama competition.

name: Dr. Giggles
summary_text: A madman who believes he's a doctor comes to the town where his crazy father was killed, and soon begins murdering people and becoming infatuated with a teenage girl who has a heart condition.

name: Center Stage: Turn It Up
summary_text: A self-trained dancer from the streets of Detroit finds her way after auditioning for the most prestigious ballet academy in New York.

name: Scooby-Doo! The Mystery Begins
summary_text: The story of how Mystery Inc. was formed.

name: Barabbas
summary_text: Barabbas, the criminal that the Jewish leaders induced the populace to vote to set free, so that Christ could be crucified, is haunted by the image of Jesus for the rest of his life.

name: They Died with Their Boots On
summary_text: A highly fictionalized account of the life of George Armstrong Custer from his arrival at West Point in 1857 to his death at the battle of the Little Big Horn in 1876.

name: Elevator
summary_text: Racism collides with corporate greed when nine strangers - one of whom has a bomb - become trapped in a Wall Street elevator.

name: Walking Out
summary_text: An urban teenager journeys to Montana to hunt big game with his estranged father. Father and son struggle to connect, until a brutal encounter in the heart of the wilderness changes everything.

name: Images
summary_text: A schizophrenic housewife kills off each of her terrorizing apparitions, unsure if these demons are merely figments of her imagination or part of reality.

name: Only the Strong
summary_text: Ex-Special Forces soldier Louis Stevens returns to Miami to find his former high school overrun by drugs and violence. A master of the Brazilian martial art, capoeira, Stevens pledges to ...                See full summary »

name: Singam 2
summary_text: Tough cop Durai Singam performs an undercover operation and identifies some nefarious activities in the seas around the coastal town.

name: I Melt with You
summary_text: When four 40-something college friends meet up for their annual reunion, things start to spiral out of control, and a pact they made as young men is revisited.

name: Nunta muta
summary_text: In a small isolated village, in 1953, a wedding is interrupted by the news about the death of Stalin. Because any public celebration is forbidden, they decide to turn the happy event into a silent wedding.

name: Finding Your Feet
summary_text: On the eve of retirement a middle class, judgmental snob discovers her husband has been having an affair with her best friend and is forced into exile with her bohemian sister who lives on an impoverished inner-city council estate.

name: Living Is Easy with Eyes Closed
summary_text: In Spain in 1966, an English teacher picks up two hitchhikers on his quest to meet John Lennon.

name: Chlopaki nie placza
summary_text: A satirical look at the gangsters of Poland and some teens who accidentally get involved with them.

name: Polis
summary_text: Musa Rami, who has become a legend with his struggle against the mafia, is a police officer at homicide division. One day prior to celebrating his 63rd birthday, with a surprise party ...                See full summary »

name: Head
summary_text: The Monkees are tossed about in a psychedelic, surrealist, plotless, circular bit of fun fluff.

name: Napapiirin sankarit
summary_text: Janne has made a career out of living on welfare; suddenly, his girlfriend gives him an ultimatum: Buy a new digital TV box or she will leave him.

name: Tromeo and Juliet
summary_text: Tromeo, a filmmaker, falls in love with Juliet, the daughter of a former partner who tried to steal his business from him.

name: Spirits of the Dead
summary_text: Anthology film from three European directors based on stories by Edgar Allan Poe: a cruel princess haunted by a ghostly horse, a sadistic young man haunted by his double, and an alcoholic actor haunted by the Devil.

name: Mother
summary_text: A neurotic, twice-divorced sci-fi writer moves back in with his mother to solve his personal problems.

name: Along With the Gods: The Last 49 Days
summary_text: In the afterlife, one guardian helps a man through his trials, while his two colleagues help a former guardian on earth.

name: Dayereh
summary_text: Various women struggle to function in the oppressively sexist society of contemporary Iran.

name: The Last Deadly Mission
summary_text: A washed-up Marseilles cop (Auteuil) earns a chance at redemption by protecting a woman from the man who killed her parents as he is about to be released from prison.

name: Mum & Dad
summary_text: Lena, a young Polish immigrant working as a cleaner at an airport is invited to the family home of a co-worker, which turns sinister quickly as the family intend to 'adopt' her.

name: RKO 281
summary_text: Orson Welles produces his greatest film, Citizen Kane (1941), despite the opposition of the film's de facto subject, William Randolph Hearst.

name: The Informer
summary_text: In 1922, an Irish rebel informs on his friend, then feels doom closing in.

name: A Sun
summary_text: A family of four fractures under the weight of unmet expectations, unexpected tragedy, and uncompromising pride.

name: Walt Before Mickey
summary_text: Based on the book "Walt Before Mickey" covers the early years of Walt Disney's career.

name: The Tuskegee Airmen
summary_text: The true story of how a group of African American pilots overcame racist opposition to become one of the finest US fighter groups in World War II

name: Chairman of the Board
summary_text: A surfer becomes the head of a major company.

name: A Dark Truth
summary_text: A former CIA operative turned political talk show host is hired by a disaffected corporate shareholder to expose her company's cover-up of an incident and deaths in an Ecuadorian village.

name: Loosies
summary_text: A young pickpocket in the New York subways, living a fast, free, lifestyle is confronted by a woman with whom he had a one night affair.

name: Dracula A.D. 1972
summary_text: Johnny Alucard raises Count Dracula from the dead in London in 1972. The Count goes after the descendants of Van Helsing.

name: Mike Bassett: England Manager
summary_text: After England's football (soccer) manager has a heart attack, Mike Bassett is hired as the new manager and promptly announces the team will win the World Cup.

name: A Kid in King Arthur's Court
summary_text: A Little League player is sent back into medieval times where he is given the task of saving Camelot.

name: Jeffrey
summary_text: A poignant romantic comedy about the quest for love and intimacy in the age of AIDS. A story of a thirtyish gay actor/waiter who decides to become celibate...the risk of AIDS has taken all the joy from sex.

name: Raze
summary_text: Raze, a horror/action film, focuses on two abducted women & 50 other women who are forced to fight each other using their bare hands.

name: Amer
summary_text: As a young girl Ana was a rebellious child. She was also tormented by images of death and a shadowy, ominous figure in black. Now an adult, she is once again tormented by shadowy, other-worldly forms.

name: Liquid Sky
summary_text: A small, heroin seeking UFO lands on a Manhattan roof, observes a bizarre, drug addicted fashion model and sucks endorphin from her sexual encounters' brains.

name: Hak se wui: Yi woo wai kwai
summary_text: As election time nears, current Triad chairman Lok (Yam) faces competition from his godsons. At the same time, Jimmy (Koo) looks to increase his business relations with mainland China.

name: Salako
summary_text: A naive and simpleton villager is trying to marry the landlord's doughter, who is in love with a vigilante outlaw

name: The Ruling Class
summary_text: A member of the House of Lords dies, leaving his estate to his son. Unfortunately, his son thinks he is Jesus Christ. The other, somewhat more respectable, members of their family plot to steal the estate from him. Murder and mayhem ensue.

name: California Split
summary_text: When a casual gambler befriends a professional one, he begins to mirror his life, sending both deeper into the sleazy gambling world where the stakes keep getting bigger.

name: The Saddest Music in the World
summary_text: A musical of sorts set in Winnipeg during the Great Depression, where a beer baroness organizes a contest to find the saddest music in the world. Musicians from around the world descend on the city to try and win the $25,000 prize.

name: Nothing
summary_text: After a terrible day, two good friends and housemates find the outside world converted into a featureless and empty white void.

name: The Thief Lord
summary_text: After their mother dies, two boys flee their mean aunt and head for Venice, Italy, where they meet Scipio, the mysterious "Thief Lord." Along with a small gang of abandoned kids, the boys start robbing the rich to support themselves.

name: Karla
summary_text: Based on real events, Paul Bernardo and his wife, Karla Homolka, kidnap, sexually abuse, and murder three young girls.

name: Digging for Fire
summary_text: The discovery of a bone and a gun send a husband and wife on separate adventures over the course of a weekend.

name: Mulberry St
summary_text: A deadly infection breaks out in Manhattan, causing humans to develop into blood-thirsty rat creatures.

name: Sjecas li se, Dolly Bell
summary_text: A young man grows up in Sarajevo in the 1960s, under the shadow of his good, but ailing father, and gets attracted by the world of small-time criminals. They hire him to hide a young ...                See full summary »

name: Some Came Running
summary_text: A veteran returns home to deal with family secrets and small-town scandals.

name: Revenge of the Bridesmaids
summary_text: Two women plot revenge against the woman marrying their friend's ex-boyfriend.

name: Whisky
summary_text: When his long-lost brother resurfaces, Jacobo, desperate to prove his life has added up to something, looks to scrounge up a wife. He turns to Marta, an employee at his sock factory, with ...                See full summary »

name: Godzilla vs. Destoroyah
summary_text: The aftermath of the Oxygen Destroyer brings forth Destoroyah, a beast intent on killing Godzilla, who is on the verge of a nuclear meltdown.

name: Lake Eerie
summary_text: A young widow moves into an old house on Lake Erie to recover from the sudden loss of her husband; however, she soon discovers a dark secret and that she is not alone.

name: Retroactive
summary_text: A psychiatrist makes multiple trips through time to save a woman that was murdered by her brutal husband.

name: Svetat e golyam i spasenie debne otvsyakade
summary_text: The story of Alex, who, with the help of his charismatic grandfather, Bai Dan, embarks on a journey in search of his real self.

name: Die Feuerzangenbowle
summary_text: A successful writer, home-schooled in his youth, masquerades as a student at a secondary school to experience all the fun and pranks he missed out on.

name: Chamatkar
summary_text: When Sunder loses everything, he seeks refuge in a graveyard, where he befriends a ghost.

name: Kite
summary_text: After her cop father is killed, a young woman tracks the murderer down with the help of his ex-partner.

name: Prête-moi ta main
summary_text: Luis enjoys the liberty of being single. He has a smell for perfumes and thus money. However, his 5 sisters and mom believe that at 43, he should be looking for a wife, not one-night stands. They find candi/dates. He hires a "fiancée".

name: Dave Made a Maze
summary_text: Dave, an artist who has yet to complete anything significant in his career, builds a fort in his living room out of pure frustration, only to wind up trapped by the fantastical pitfalls, booby traps, and critters of his own creation.

name: Mannequin: On the Move
summary_text: A young department store intern falls in love with a female store mannequin who is really a peasant girl fallen under a thousand year spell. She comes to life whenever he removes the cursed necklace from her.

name: The Concorde... Airport '79
summary_text: A supersonic airborne disaster. In order to survive a flight headed for the Moscow Olympics, passengers of the Concorde must endure aerial acrobatics to dodge missiles and survive a device that decompresses the plane.

name: Trial by Fire
summary_text: The tragic and controversial story of Cameron Todd Willingham, who was executed in Texas for killing his three children after scientific evidence and expert testimony that bolstered his claims of innocence were suppressed.

name: Rollercoaster
summary_text: A blackmailer threatens to sabotage roller coasters at various American amusement parks if he isn't paid a huge ransom.

name: Marvellous
summary_text: The life of Neil Baldwin, a man who has shrugged off his perceived limitations to live an incredible life.

name: Mischief
summary_text: 1956. Obsessed with the hottest girl in class, a gawky high school student takes a crash course in teenage coolness from his motorcycle rebel neighbour.

name: Pari
summary_text: Arnab tries to help Ruksahana, who is found under mysterious circumstances in a house. He lets her stay at his home until he discovers something strange about her.

name: #Realityhigh
summary_text: High-achieving high-school senior Dani Barnes dreams of getting into UC Davis, the world's top veterinary school. Then a glamorous new friend draws her into a Southern California scene that threatens everything she's worked for.

name: Chuck
summary_text: A drama inspired by the life of heavyweight boxer Chuck Wepner, who had a once-in-a-lifetime bout with Muhammad Ali that would inspire the film Rocky (1976).

name: Iron Jawed Angels
summary_text: Defiant young activists take the women's suffrage movement by storm, putting their lives at risk to help American women win the right to vote.

name: Complete Unknown
summary_text: As a man contemplates moving to a new state with his wife for her graduate program, an old flame - a woman who often changes identities - reenters his life at a birthday dinner party.

name: Dead & Breakfast
summary_text: A night at a local bed and breakfast turns into a bloody supernatural fight to the death.

name: Matthias & Maxime
summary_text: A drama focusing on a group of friends in their late 20s.

name: The Queen's Corgi
summary_text: The British monarch's (Dame Julie Walters') favorite dog gets lost from the palace and finds himself at a dog fight club. He then begins his long journey to find his way back home.

name: Zama
summary_text: Based on the novel by Antonio Di Benedetto written in 1956, on Don Diego de Zama, a Spanish officer of the seventeenth century settled in Asunción, who awaits his transfer to Buenos Aires.

name: Vile
summary_text: Four friends are kidnapped by a madman and locked in a house with six other people. Each of the captives has to endure life-threatening torture to fill a device attached to their heads or they will be trapped inside forever.

name: Forgotten Silver
summary_text: The film deals with the career of a supposedly forgotten pioneer of international cinema, Colin McKenzie, who was allegedly born in rural New Zealand in 1888.

name: The Wild Life
summary_text: A daring parrot recounts how Robinson Crusoe came to be stranded on a tropical island.

name: Naam Shabana
summary_text: This Spin-off from Baby (2015) provides the back-story of intelligence agent Shabana, and chronicles how she becomes a spy.

name: The Bunker
summary_text: Germany, 1944. The forests of the Ardennes. A platoon of battle weary German soldiers, forced into confusion and retreat by advancing Allied forces, take refuge in an isolated Siegfried Line bunker.

name: King Solomon's Mines
summary_text: Adventurer Allan Quartermain leads an expedition into uncharted African territory in an attempt to locate an explorer who went missing during his search for the fabled diamond mines of King Solomon.

name: Naruto the Movie: Ninja Clash in the Land of Snow
summary_text: Naruto and his team are hired to protect a young actress from three rogue warriors in the Land of the Snow.

name: Recep Ivedik 6
summary_text: The sixth adventure of Turkish box office record holder comedy character, Recep Ivedik. Surprisingly Recep founds himself in Kenya instead of Konya (an Anatolian city of Turkey) and the adventure begins...

name: The Measure of a Man
summary_text: An unemployed factory worker is trying to make ends meet in working-class France.

name: Limbo
summary_text: In an economically devastated Alaskan town, a fisherman with a troublesome past dates a woman whose young daughter does not approve of him. When he witnesses the murder of his shady brother, he, the woman and the kid run to the wilderness.

name: Tag
summary_text: A girl's life cascades into chaos as everyone around her suffers a gruesome fate while she becomes less certain of who she is and her once-once normal.

name: John Mulaney: New in Town
summary_text: Comedian John Mulaney talks about his milk toast boyish looks, his childhood, his Jewish girlfriend, his gayish charm, his favorite TV shows, Ice-T, a homeless person he met in N.Y., and a prostate exam with Batman.

name: El nino
summary_text: A small-time trafficker working in the Gibraltar Straits.

name: Robin Williams Live on Broadway
summary_text: The fourth HBO stand-up special by Robin Williams.

name: Barcelona
summary_text: An American working in Barcelona, having sworn off beautiful women, is forced to be host to his playboy cousin in this witty comedy of good intentions and mixed signals.

name: Emperor of the North
summary_text: In 1933, during the Depression, Shack the brutal conductor of the number 19 train has a personal vendetta against the best train hopping hobo tramp in the Northwest, A No. 1.

name: Where the Money Is
summary_text: Old bank robber Henry, paralyzed from a stroke, is moved from a prison hospital to a retirement home, where Carol is a nurse. She doesn't believe he's paralyzed and sees him as a way out of her boring life.

name: Fire
summary_text: Two women who are abandoned by their husbands, find love and solace in each other.

name: The Great Santini
summary_text: As he approaches manhood, Ben Meechum struggles to win the approval of his demanding alpha male father, an aggressively competitive, but frustrated Marine pilot.

name: Sweetwater
summary_text: In the late 1800s, a fanatical religious leader, a renegade Sheriff, and a former prostitute collide in a blood triangle on the rugged plains of the New Mexico Territory.

name: Footnote
summary_text: Eliezer and Uriel Shkolnik are father and son as well as rival professors in Talmudic Studies. When both men learn that Eliezer will be lauded for his work, their complicated relationship reaches a new peak.

name: The Most Hated Woman in America
summary_text: The life of Madelyn Murray O'Hair, the outspoken activist and founder of American Atheists.

name: Necronomicon: Book of Dead
summary_text: Lovecraft visualizes 3 stories in Necronomicon: The Drowned, The Cold and Whispers, about bringing a dead wife and child back to life, extending life and aliens.

name: Animal Farm
summary_text: The animals of a farm successfully revolt against its human owner, only to slide into a more brutal tyranny amongst themselves.

name: Fort Apache the Bronx
summary_text: In New York City, South Bronx's main police precinct is nicknamed Fort Apache by its employees who feel like troopers surrounded by hostiles in a wild west isolated outpost.

name: The Three Musketeers
summary_text: D'Artagnan (Gene Kelly) and his Musketeer comrades thwart the plans of Cardinal Richelieu (Vincent Price) to usurp King Louis XIII's (Frank Morgan's) power.

name: Game of Thrones: The Last Watch
summary_text: Chronicling the creation of Game of Thrones (2011)'s final season, its most ambitious and complicated one.

name: Trojan War
summary_text: Brad is about to hook up with the girl of his dreams, but runs into a problem, no condom. So Brad sets out into the night to find one, running into many obstacles along the way, while not knowing his best friend, Leah is in love with him.

name: Underverden
summary_text: A successful doctor who loses his little brother in a gang-related assault gives up his privileged life to become a masked warrior and avenge his brother's death.

name: Norman
summary_text: Norman Oppenheimer is a small time operator who befriends a young politician at a low point in his life. Three years later, when the politician becomes an influential world leader, Norman's life dramatically changes for better and worse.

name: Beneath the Darkness
summary_text: After watching their best friend get murdered, a group of teens struggle to expose a local hero as the vicious killer and keep from becoming his next victims.

name: Décalage horaire
summary_text: A worn-out businessman and a beautician on the run collide in a Paris airport. Love arrives, all its hurdles be damned.

name: Thevar Magan
summary_text: The urbane son of a village chieftain struggles between his personal aspirations and those of his family.

name: Clash by Night
summary_text: Mae Doyle comes back to her hometown a cynical woman. Her brother Joe fears that his love, fish cannery worker Peggy, may wind up like Mae. Mae marries Jerry and has a baby; she is happy but restless, drawn to Jerry's friend Earl.

name: Street Dancer 3D
summary_text: Two rival dance groups from India and Pakistan who are always competing against each other, join forces when it comes to competing at an international dance competition.

name: Tadpole
summary_text: Coming-of-age story about a suave 15-year-old prep school student who falls in love with his stepmother. When her best friend responds to his advances, he suddenly finds himself in way over his head.

name: Nightmare City
summary_text: An airplane exposed to radiation lands, and blood drinking zombies emerge armed with knives, guns and teeth! They go on a rampage slicing, dicing, and biting their way across the Italian countryside.

name: The Other
summary_text: A series of gruesome accidents plague a small American farming community in the summer of 1935, encircling two identical twin brothers and their family.

name: Carousel
summary_text: Fifteen years after his death, a carousel barker is granted permission to return to Earth for one day to make amends to his widow and their daughter.

name: Hawking
summary_text: A drama documenting the life and work of the theoretical physicist Professor Stephen Hawking who, despite being diagnosed with motor neurone disease at the age of 21, has galvanized the ...                See full summary »

name: Brink!
summary_text: Andy "Brink" Brinker and his in-line skating crew--Peter, Jordy, and Gabriella--who call themselves "Soul-Skaters" (which means they skate for the fun of it, and not for the money), clash ...                See full summary »

name: Laserblast
summary_text: A teenager stumbles upon an alien weapon, which transforms him into a grotesque killer.

name: Husbands
summary_text: After the death of a common friend, three married men leave their lives together, seeking pleasure and freedom and ultimately leaving for London.

name: Katok i skripka
summary_text: Seven year old Sasha practices violin every day to satisfy the ambition of his parents. Already withdrawn as a result of his routines, Sasha quickly regains confidence when he accidentally ...                See full summary »

name: Satan's Little Helper
summary_text: A naive young boy unknowingly becomes the pawn of a serial killer.

name: Karpuz Kabugundan Gemiler Yapmak
summary_text: In his award-winning debut feature film, director Ahmet Ulucay portrays the innocence of childhood and the lure of the cinema for two teens in a small Turkish village. Working for a ...                See full summary »

name: A Countess from Hong Kong
summary_text: In Hong Kong, the ambassador returning to America meets the Russian countess, a refugee without a passport, who decides to hide in his cabin.

name: Ultramarines: A Warhammer 40,000 Movie
summary_text: A squad of Ultramarines answer a distress call from an Imperial Shrine World. A full Company of Imperial Fists was stationed there, but there is no answer from them. The squad investigates to find out what has happened there.

name: Samurai II: Duel at Ichijoji Temple
summary_text: Musashi Miyamoto returns to Kyoto after years of absence. After a series of fights against the Yoshioka School, he challenges its master to a duel.

name: PM Narendra Modi
summary_text: Biography of India's Prime Minister Shri Narendra Modi.

name: Justin and the Knights of Valour
summary_text: A young boy grows up as he embarks on a quest to become a knight.

name: Dor
summary_text: Two woman --different backgrounds, miles apart, and strangers to each other-- are linked by tragedy. Their new-found friendship is tested as one holds the fate of the other's husband in her hands.

name: Pagglait
summary_text: Widowed soon after marriage, a young woman grapples with an inability to grieve, quirky relatives and a startling discovery about her late husband.

name: The Firm
summary_text: Football hooligans organize themselves into firms that represent their favorite team.

name: Amateur
summary_text: An amnesiac wakes up on an NYC alley. He meets Isabelle, an ex nun now erotic writer, at a diner and follows her home. She helps him find his identity. Then there's Sofia, the porn star.

name: The Killer Elite
summary_text: Mike Locken, who works for a private security firm affiliated with the C.I.A., is betrayed by his partner and left apparently crippled for life.

name: Testament
summary_text: The life of a suburban American family is scarred after a nuclear attack.

name: The Death & Life of John F. Donovan
summary_text: A decade after the death of an American television star, a young actor reminisces about the written correspondence he shared with him, as well as the impact those letters had on both their lives.

name: Visioneers
summary_text: When people begin exploding from stress, George Washington Winsterhammerman tries to ignore the epidemic and live his usual life, but then he suffers his first symptom.

name: The Little Princess
summary_text: A little girl is left by her father in an exclusive seminary for girls, when her father fights in the Second Boer War. Later, when he is presumed dead she is forced to become a servant.

name: The Wizards Return: Alex vs. Alex
summary_text: While visiting Tuscany, Italy, a young wizard accidentally creates an evil version of herself.

name: Action Replayy
summary_text: A young man tries to revive his parents' wilting marriage by traveling to the 1970s when their romance was budding and make it bloom: something more complex than he expects.

name: Flirting
summary_text: Two freethinking teenagers - a boy and a girl - confront with authoritarian teachers in their boarding schools. The other students treat this differently.

name: The River
summary_text: The growing pains of three young women contrast with the immutability of the holy Bengal River, around which their daily lives unfold.

name: The Desert Fox: The Story of Rommel
summary_text: The story of the final years of the respected World War II German general, Erwin Rommel.

name: The Maid
summary_text: A drama centered on a maid trying to hold on to her position after having served a family for 23 years.

name: We All Loved Each Other So Much
summary_text: Three partisans bound by a strong friendship return home after the war, but the clash with everyday reality puts a strain on their bond.

name: deUsynlige
summary_text: A man convicted in his teens for killing a child is released on parole. He struggles to build a new life, but his past is uncovered.

name: Riders
summary_text: A gang of extreme sportsmen raises the stakes in their criminal activities.

name: Electrick Children
summary_text: Rachel, a teenager born and raised in her Mormon community, believes that she has been inpregnated by listening to music and must get to Vegas to find the "father" of her miracle baby.

name: The Gathering Storm
summary_text: Winston Churchill's wilderness years prior to World War II, when only he could see the threat that Adolf Hitler and a rearmed Germany posed to Europe.

name: Fantozzi
summary_text: A good-natured but unlucky Italian is constantly going on a difficult situations, but never lose his mood.

name: By the Grace of God
summary_text: Three men, abused by the same priest during their childhood, engage in a fight for justice that will expose their personal experiences and question their life with their wife, family, and colleagues.

name: The Harder They Come
summary_text: Wishing to become a successful Reggae singer, a young Jamaican man finds himself tied to corrupt record producers and drug pushers.

name: Sightless
summary_text: After an attack renders her blind, Ellen Ashland withdraws from the world to recover. But soon she plunges into paranoia, unable to convince anyone that her assailant has returned to terrorize her by hiding in plain sight.

name: Walled In
summary_text: Supervising the razing of a mysterious building, a demolition company rep discovers past inhabitants entombed within its walls by a vicious murderer. Now she must turn the tables on the killer before she becomes his latest victim.

name: Hunterrr
summary_text: Mandar, an ordinary guy is obsessed with sex and chases girls until he meets Tripti and decides to settle down with her.

name: We Have Always Lived in the Castle
summary_text: Merricat, Constance and their Uncle Julian live in isolation after experiencing a family tragedy six years earlier. When cousin Charles arrives to steal the family fortune, he also threatens a dark secret they've been hiding.

name: Frozen Land
summary_text: When a schoolteacher is sacked he projects his bad mood at his troubled teen son. He in turn buys a CD player from a pawnshop with counterfeit money. This causes a chain-reaction that ...                See full summary »

name: Drums Along the Mohawk
summary_text: Newlyweds Gil and Lana Martin try to establish a farm in the Mohawk Valley but are menaced by Indians and Tories as the Revolutionary War begins.

name: Andre the Giant
summary_text: A look at the life and career of professional wrestler André Roussimoff, who gained notoriety in the 1980s as Andre the Giant.

name: Dark Horse
summary_text: Romance blooms between two tricenarians in arrested development: an avid toy collector who is the dark horse of his family and a depressed woman on the rebound.

name: 12 Dates of Christmas
summary_text: A story that follows Kate, a young woman who after a horrible blind date on Christmas Eve, wakes up to find she is re-living that same day and date all over again.

name: Blonde Ambition
summary_text: A young professional woman (Simpson) unwittingly becomes the pawn of two business executives in their bid to oust the head of a mega-conglomerate.

name: The Field
summary_text: When a field (which has been farmed by the McCabe family for generations) goes up for auction, the patriarch of the McCabe family will stop at nothing to prevent a rich American from buying it.

name: Kiss Me Kate
summary_text: An ex-husband and wife team star in a musical version of 'The Taming of the Shrew'; off-stage, the production is troublesome with ex-lovers' quarrels and two gangsters looking for some money owed to them.

name: Kiki, Love to Love
summary_text: Under Madrid's scorching summer sun, ordinary couples with real passion and the unquenchable desire to love and be loved, share the same irrepressible urge to investigate their own sexuality through five intertwined stories.

name: It's a Free World...
summary_text: After being fired from her job, Angie teams up with her flatmate to find employment for immigrants.

name: And the Ship Sails On
summary_text: In 1914, a luxury ship leaves Italy in order to scatter the ashes of a famous opera singer. A lovable bumbling journalist chronicles the voyage and meets the singer's many eccentric friends and admirers.

name: The Sunshine Boys
summary_text: A vaudeville duo agree to reunite for a television special, but it turns out that they can't stand each other.

name: Sole a catinelle
summary_text: The story of a father and a son. An on the road trip from South to North.

name: Spree
summary_text: Thirsty for a following, Kurt Kunkle is a rideshare driver who has figured out a deadly plan to go viral.

name: Waking Up in Reno
summary_text: A romantic comedy about two trashy couples travelling to Reno to see a monster truck show.

name: The Thief of Bagdad
summary_text: A recalcitrant thief vies with a duplicitous Mongol ruler for the hand of a beautiful princess.

name: Bushwhacked
summary_text: On the run from authorities, a sleazy courier poses as a Scout leader on a camping trip. But he has no idea what he's in for when he must actually take charge of a group of kids.

name: Zazie dans le Métro
summary_text: With her mother away for the weekend, a brash and precocious ten-year-old country-girl sets out to explore Paris during a Métro strike, under her uncle's not-so-watchful eye. Can a little girl cause so much chaos in the heart of the city?

name: Cut Off
summary_text: Thriller set in the world of Forensic Pathology. Coroner Paul Herzfeld finds a capsule in the head of a heavily mutilated corpse, containing a phone number and single word: the name of his daughter.

name: The Last Battle
summary_text: In a post-apocalyptic future where no one is able to speak, the few remaining humans fight over resources in order to survive.

name: Dr. Phibes Rises Again
summary_text: The vengeful doctor rises again, seeking the Scrolls of Life in an attempt to resurrect his deceased wife.

name: Big Driver
summary_text: A famous mystery writer sets out for revenge after a brutal attack.

name: Most Wanted
summary_text: A Marine on death row is recruited by a shadowy U.S. military officer as part of a top-secret ops team, then gets framed for murder when the team and its officer set him up as the fall guy for the assassination of the First Lady.

name: The Beyond
summary_text: After observing an anomaly in space, scientists transplant human brains in to synthetic bodies and send them through the wormhole.

name: My Girlfriend's Boyfriend
summary_text: Jesse meets Ethan, someone she could finally fall in love with, but then she meets Troy, and now she has a dilemma.

name: Kit Kittredge: An American Girl
summary_text: Set in Cincinnati at the height of the Great Depression, Kit Kittredge, a resourceful young girl, helps her mother run a boardinghouse after her father loses his job.

name: Phoenix Forgotten
summary_text: Two decades after three teenagers disappeared in the wake of mysterious lights appearing above Phoenix, Arizona, unseen footage from that night has been discovered, chronicling the final hours of their fateful expedition.

name: Kirschblüten - Hanami
summary_text: After Rudi's wife Trudi suddenly dies, he travels to Japan to fulfill her dream of being a Butoh dancer.

name: Twelfth Night
summary_text: Shakespeare's comedy of gender confusion, in which a girl disguises herself as a man to be near the count she adores, only to be pursued by the woman he loves.

name: The Horseman on the Roof
summary_text: In a time of war and disease, a young officer gallantly tries to help a young woman find her husband.

name: Non ci resta che piangere
summary_text: In the 80s, two friends misteriously wake up in the XV century and clumsly try to intermingle with the society of the time.

name: Immortality
summary_text: Vampire in London is searching for the ideal woman to redeem him.

name: Sunday Bloody Sunday
summary_text: The emotional intricacies of a polyamorous relationship between young artist Bob and his two lovers: a lonely male doctor and a frustrated female office worker.

name: Crush
summary_text: A secret admirer's crush on a high school athlete takes a fatal turn.

name: Dying Breed
summary_text: Dying Breed interweaves the two most fascinating icons of Tasmanian history: the extinct Tasmanian tiger and "The Pieman" (aka Alexander Pearce) who was hanged for cannibalism in 1824. ...                See full summary »

name: Trancers
summary_text: A gruff bounty hunter travels back in time to 1980s Los Angeles to stop a twisted criminal who can transform people into zombie-like creatures.

name: The Childhood of a Leader
summary_text: A chronicle of the childhood of a post-World War I leader.

name: Gypsy
summary_text: Based on the Broadway hit about the life and times of burlesque dancer Gypsy Rose Lee and her aggressive stage mother, Mama Rose.

name: Pyaasa
summary_text: A talented but indigent poet Vijay struggles for love and recognition in this selfish world.

name: 247°F
summary_text: Four friends travel to a lakeside cabin for a carefree weekend, the fun turns into a nightmare when 3 of them end up locked in a hot sauna. Every minute counts and every degree matters as they fight for their lives in the heat up to 247°F.

name: The Beauty Inside
summary_text: A South Korean has a different person's body, changing every morning to a body "borrowed" for a day - man, woman, old, child and sometimes a foreigner. "He" works as furniture designer. He loves a girl. She loves him for the beauty inside.

name: All the Best: Fun Begins
summary_text: The unexpected arrival of his elder NRI brother and assorted characters complicates the life of a Goan male.

name: My Dinner with Hervé
summary_text: A look at the life of French actor Hervé Villechaize, co-star of the hit '70s TV series "Fantasy Island", who took his own life in 1993 at the age of 50.

name: The Five People You Meet in Heaven
summary_text: An elderly amusement park maintenance man, Eddie, is trapped in purgatory and the only way out is to confront five people from his past. Unfortunately, dark secrets from his service in the Philippines begin to haunt him.

name: Clean and Sober
summary_text: A hustling drug addict checks himself into rehabilitation to escape trouble with the law and realizes that it's exactly what he needs.

name: The Last Boy
summary_text: With the world's end imminent, a dying mother sends her young son on a journey to the place which grants wishes. The film's inspired by the works of 13th century Sufi mystic and poet, Rumi.

name: Dante 01
summary_text: A prisoner is brought to psychiatric detention space station orbiting a prison planet. He was exposed to aliens and gained healing power. A new doctor wants to experiment on the 7 prisoners/patients.

name: Like Father Like Son
summary_text: A mysterious potion switches the personalities of a buttoned up doctor and his laid back son.

name: The Warning
summary_text: Ten-year-old Nico receives a threatening letter and now his life is in danger. No one seems to believe him except one person that he doesn't know who has come to believe that fate itself wants the boy dead and tries to prevent it.

name: The Fugitive Kind
summary_text: Valentine "Snakeskin" Xavier, a trouble-prone drifter trying to go straight, wanders into a small Mississippi town looking for a simple and honest life but finds himself embroiled with problem-filled women.

name: The Ballad of Lefty Brown
summary_text: A thrilling and action-packed Western, The Ballad of Lefty Brown is a story about loyalty, friendship, and the relentless pursuit of justice.

name: Irma Vep
summary_text: A Chinese movie actress, in France to star in a remake of "Les Vampires", finds petty intrigues and clashing egos on the set.

name: Mardi Gras: Spring Break
summary_text: A group of college buddies sow their wild oats in New Orleans.

name: Chiedimi se sono felice
summary_text: Giacomo meets Giovanni, his former best friend, with whom he quarreled three years before. Giovanni persuades him to go visit their third friend Aldo, who is dying in Sicily. Through ...                See full summary »

name: Christmas Evil
summary_text: A toy factory worker, mentally scarred as a child upon learning Santa Claus is not real, suffers a nervous breakdown after being belittled at work, and embarks on a Yuletide killing spree.

name: The Sword and the Sorcerer
summary_text: A mercenary with a three-bladed sword rediscovers his royal heritage's dangerous future when he is recruited to help a princess foil the designs of a brutal tyrant and a powerful sorcerer in conquering a land.

name: Hair Show
summary_text: Peaches, a hair stylist from Baltimore, and her estranged sister, Angela, the owner of an upscale salon in Beverly Hills, get reacquainted when Peaches decides to attend a celebration for ...                See full summary »

name: Khiladiyon Ka Khiladi
summary_text: A man (Akshay Kumar) searches for his missing brother (Inder Kumar) who is also wanted by the police.

name: City of Industry
summary_text: A retired thief swears revenge on the lunatic who murdered his brother and partner, while going on the run with the loot they stole.

name: At the Circus
summary_text: The Marx Brothers try to help the owner of a circus recover some stolen funds before he finds himself out of a job.

name: Naa Peru Surya Na Illu India
summary_text: A short tempered soldier aspiring to serve at the borders is tasked with getting clearance signature from his estranged father, a professor, who in turn challenges him to give up anger.

name: Innocence
summary_text: A look inside an offbeat boarding school for young girls.

name: Future World
summary_text: A young boy searches a future world wasteland for a rumored cure for his dying mother.

name: Long Weekend
summary_text: A vacationing couple in the wilderness learns what happens when they disrespect nature.

name: Boiling Point
summary_text: A pair of sociopath killers take on the police and the mob in order to make one last big score.

name: Destroy All Monsters
summary_text: At the turn of the century, Earth's monsters have been safely rounded up and studied on Monsterland. Chaos erupts when a race of she-aliens known as the Kilaaks unleashes the monsters across the world.

name: Dragon Eyes
summary_text: In St. Jude, drug dealers and corrupt cops have destroyed an urban neighborhood. But newcomer, Hong, has the fighting skills and moral vision to save this town from itself.

name: Maybe Baby
summary_text: A comedy about a couple (Hugh Laurie and Joely Richardson) who are trying to conceive a child.

name: She Done Him Wrong
summary_text: In the Gay Nineties, a seductive nightclub singer contends with several suitors, including a jealous escaped convict and a handsome temperance league member.

name: The Watcher in the Woods
summary_text: When a family moves to a country home, the young girls experience strange happenings that have a link to an occult event years past.
